verses.verse: And it came to pass <S%H1961><s%> in the fourth <S%H702><s%> year <S%H8141><s%> of king <S%H4428><s%> Darius, <S%H1867><s%> that the word <S%H1697><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> came <S%H1961><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> Zechariah <S%H2148><s%> in the fourth <S%H702><s%> day of the ninth <S%H8671><s%> month, <S%H2320><s%> even in Chisleu; <S%H3691><s%>

When they had sent <S%H7971><s%> unto the house of God <S%H1008><s%> Sherezer <S%H8272><s%> and Regem-melech, <S%H7278><s%> and their men, <S%H376><s%> to pray <S%H2470><s%> <S%H853><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the LORD, <S%H3068><s%>

And to speak <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> the priests <S%H3548><s%> which <S%H834><s%> were in the house <S%H1004><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> of hosts, <S%H6635><s%> and to <S%H413><s%> the prophets, <S%H5030><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> Should I weep <S%H1058><s%> in the fifth <S%H2549><s%> month, <S%H2320><s%> separating myself, <S%H5144><s%> as <S%H834><s%> I have done <S%H6213><s%> these <S%H2088><s%> so many <S%H4100><s%> years? <S%H8141><s%>
Then came <S%H1961><s%> the word <S%H1697><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> of hosts <S%H6635><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> me, saying, <S%H559><s%>

Speak <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> of the land, <S%H776><s%> and to <S%H413><s%> the priests, <S%H3548><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> When <S%H3588><s%> ye fasted <S%H6684><s%> and mourned <S%H5594><s%> in the fifth <S%H2549><s%> and seventh <S%H7637><s%> month, even those <S%H2088><s%> seventy <S%H7657><s%> years, <S%H8141><s%> did ye at all fast <S%H6684><s%> <S%H6684><s%> unto me, even to me? <S%H589><s%>

And when <S%H3588><s%> ye did eat, <S%H398><s%> and when <S%H3588><s%> ye did drink, <S%H8354><s%> did not <S%H3808><s%> ye <S%H859><s%> eat <S%H398><s%> for yourselves, and drink <S%H8354><s%> for yourselves?

Should ye not <S%H3808><s%> hear <S%H853><s%> the words <S%H1697><s%> which <S%H834><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> hath cried <S%H7121><s%> by <S%H3027><s%> the former <S%H7223><s%> prophets, <S%H5030><s%> when Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%> was <S%H1961><s%> inhabited <S%H3427><s%> and in prosperity, <S%H7961><s%> and the cities <S%H5892><s%> thereof round about <S%H5439><s%> her, when men inhabited <S%H3427><s%> the south <S%H5045><s%> and the plain? <S%H8219><s%>
And the word <S%H1697><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> came <S%H1961><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> Zechariah, <S%H2148><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%>

Thus <S%H3541><s%> speaketh <S%H559><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> of hosts, <S%H6635><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> Execute <S%H8199><s%> true <S%H571><s%> judgment, <S%H4941><s%> and show <S%H6213><s%> mercy <S%H2617><s%> and compassions <S%H7356><s%> every man <S%H376><s%> to <S%H854><s%> his brother: <S%H251><s%>

And oppress <S%H6231><s%> not <S%H408><s%> the widow, <S%H490><s%> nor the fatherless, <S%H3490><s%> the stranger, <S%H1616><s%> nor the poor; <S%H6041><s%> and let none <S%H408><s%> of you imagine <S%H2803><s%> evil <S%H7451><s%> <S%H376><s%> against his brother <S%H251><s%> in your heart. <S%H3824><s%>

But they refused <S%H3985><s%> to hearken, <S%H7181><s%> and pulled <S%H5414><s%> away <S%H5637><s%> the shoulder, <S%H3802><s%> and stopped <S%H3513><s%> their ears, <S%H241><s%> that they should not hear. <S%H4480><s%> <S%H8085><s%>

Yea, they made <S%H7760><s%> their hearts <S%H3820><s%> as an adamant stone, <S%H8068><s%> lest they should hear <S%H4480><s%> <S%H8085><s%> the <S%H853><s%> law, <S%H8451><s%> and the words <S%H1697><s%> which <S%H834><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> of hosts <S%H6635><s%> hath sent <S%H7971><s%> in his spirit <S%H7307><s%> by <S%H3027><s%> the former <S%H7223><s%> prophets: <S%H5030><s%> therefore came <S%H1961><s%> a great <S%H1419><s%> wrath <S%H7110><s%> from <S%H4480><s%> <S%H854><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> of hosts. <S%H6635><s%>

Therefore it is come to pass, <S%H1961><s%> that as <S%H834><s%> he cried, <S%H7121><s%> and they would not <S%H3808><s%> hear; <S%H8085><s%> so <S%H3651><s%> they cried, <S%H7121><s%> and I would not <S%H3808><s%> hear, <S%H8085><s%> saith <S%H559><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> of hosts: <S%H6635><s%>

But I scattered them with a whirlwind <S%H5590><s%> among <S%H5921><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the nations <S%H1471><s%> whom <S%H834><s%> they knew <S%H3045><s%> not. <S%H3808><s%> Thus the land <S%H776><s%> was desolate <S%H8074><s%> after <S%H310><s%> them, that no man passed through <S%H4480><s%> <S%H5674><s%> nor returned: <S%H4480><s%> <S%H7725><s%> for they laid <S%H7760><s%> the pleasant <S%H2532><s%> land <S%H776><s%> desolate. <S%H8047><s%>
